sect2.title: Installation of Perl
sect2.para: First adapt some hard-wired paths to the C library:
And make sure some static extensions get built:

screen.userinput: chmod u+w hints/linux.sh echo 'static_ext="IO re Fcntl"' >> hints/linux.sh

sect2.para: Then copy these tools and their libraries:

screen.userinput: cp perl pod/pod2man /stage1/bin mkdir -p /stage1/lib/perl5/5.8.0 cp -R lib/* /stage1/lib/perl5/5.8.0
